profileAlternative.name: Joshua (Minxiang) Tu
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at Facebook
profileAlternative.summary: Big data enthusiast and enjoy providing data oriented, fact driven solution to business problem with 5 years of experience in big and complex data manipulation and analytics, strong background with data mining, prediction modeling, analytics programming with R, Python and SAS. Advanced degree with wide knowledge in statistic, machine learning, distribution system. Consulting experience in financial advisory leveraging wealth management data and credit card transaction data.

aboutAlternative.text: Big data enthusiast and enjoy providing data oriented, fact driven solution to business problem with 5 years of experience in big and complex data manipulation and analytics, strong background with data mining, prediction modeling, analytics programming with R, Python and SAS. given.text: Kai is a great colleague as well as a good friend. I really admire his intense interest in the area of creativity and innovation and also his leadership skill as the president of SIGMA.

items: Knowledge Mining and Prediction Model Project.
